main event: On November 6, 1957, multiple observers reported seeing unidentified flying objects over various locations in California.
interesting points: The sighting duration was reported to be 3 minutes,Participants noted seeing 5 objects in total, Objects were observed using ground radar, Reports mentioned one object resembling a grapefruit in shape, Conflicting evaluations categorized the sighted objects as possible meteors.
witness description: Civilian observers and a retired U.S. Army member
